name: Flying Pegasus Horse New Games
description: Flying horse new pegasus game is the new exciting and fun to play pegasus flight simulator for horse flying games lovers. Enjoy the best designed levels in this awesome pegasus flight simulator. There are uptown 15 unique levels in this game. Complete each level by collecting checkpoints and 3 stars. Collecting at least 2 stars is necessary for unlocking next level. There is also an open world level in this game. You can interact with other persons in open world level. They can give you quests and tasks. By completing tasks, you will be rewarded with experience and coins. Two unique Pegasus are available in the shop. There are 4 unique characters in this game. They can be unlocked through shop. Hope you enjoy the game & rate us.
